roleset.name: exchange letters with or communicate generally

example.name: pen pal
example.text: John has been corresponding with a friend in Lower Slobovia for quite some time now.
example.arg: with a friend in Lower Slobovia

roleset.note: Frames file for 'correspond' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries battle-36.4-1, correspond-36.1.

example.name: decent example
example.text: The agency noted that because of a strike by Finance Ministry personnel the provisional estimate doesn't correspond exactly to the consumer price index usually published.
example.arg: to the consumer price index usually published
